thread.title: J.R. Smith, Lil Wayne send RIP messages about Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: J.R. Smith, Lil Wayne send RIP messages about Lamar Odom - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: J.R. Smith, Lil Wayne send RIP messages about Lamar Odom
text:
Kirby Lee/Kirby Lee/WireImage.com Lamar Odom is reportedly in a Nevada hospital after being found unconscious at a brothel. While most NBA players and celebrities were wishing Lamar Odom well upon learning that the former Laker was fighting for his life after being found unconscious in a Nevada brothel , J.R. Smith was part of a group of notables sharing RIP messages about the troubled former NBA champion.
“RIP LO damn man I can't believe this,” Smith wrote on Instagram along with a photo of Odom from his college days at the University of Rhode Island.
KOBE BRYANT JOINS KHLOE KARDASHIAN AT LAMAR ODOM'S BEDSIDE
“... If this isn't a sign I don't know what is!!! This life is so much bigger then basketball an any other sport! I can't imagine what he was going through but I know he could have had some better people in his corner! Life doesn't care how much money you made or how man championships you have when its time to go it's time to go! Some people say ‘it's easy to be happy you have millions!’ With all the money that comes trust an believe it comes with just as much heartache! Learning a balance is key never get to high on the highs an never get to low on the lows! #RIPLO”
